name: DCdetector
full_name: Dual attention Contrastive representation learning Detector
paper: DCdetector: Dual Attention Contrastive Representation Learning for Time Series Anomaly Detection. In Proceedings of the 29th ACM SIGKDD Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining (KDD '23).
description: DCdetector utilizes a dual attention asymmetric design to create the permutated environment and pure contrastive loss to guide the learning process, thus learning a permutation invariant representation with superior discrimination abilities.
